item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Hyrum's Law in Golang (16 points | 3 comments)
2. Everyone is capable of, and can benefit from, mathematical thinking (119 points | 52 comments)
3. Niantic announces “Large Geospatial Model” trained on Pokémon Go player data (363 points | 276 comments)
4. The Matrix: Infinite-Horizon World Generation with Real-Time Interaction (57 points | 14 comments)
5. Electrobun: Cross-platform desktop applications written in TypeScript (118 points | 32 comments)
6. Show HN: We open-sourced our compost monitoring tech (76 points | 17 comments)
7. The Fastest Redis Ever (30 points | 8 comments)
8. Building Databases over a Weekend (74 points | 10 comments)
9. Undergraduates with family income below $200k will be tuition-free at MIT (540 points | 359 comments)
10. Z-Library Helps Students to Overcome Academic Poverty, Study Finds (291 points | 65 comments)
11. AlphaQubit: AI to identify errors in Quantum Computers (112 points | 43 comments)
12. Doxx/Darkflare: DarkFlare TCPoCDN (TCP over CDN) (73 points | 16 comments)
13. January 1928: Dirac equation unifies quantum mechanics and special relativity (23 points | 15 comments)
14. Weight-loss drug found to shrink heart muscle in mice, human cells (222 points | 243 comments)
15. Boeing overcharged the U.S. Air Force 8,000% above market for soap dispensers (75 points | 56 comments)
16. What is the origin of the lake tank image that has become a meme? (2021) (534 points | 121 comments)
17. How good are American roads? (185 points | 401 comments)
18. New Calculation Finds we are close to the Kessler Syndrome [video] (79 points | 92 comments)
19. Vapi (YC W21) Is Hiring Founding Senior Engineer (Front End) ( | hide)
20. DOJ filed paperwork to US District Court to force Google to spin off Chrome [pdf] (86 points | 62 comments)
21. Show HN: Autotab – Programmable AI browser for turning web tasks into APIs (93 points | 43 comments)
22. Shadow Boxing (2016) (27 points | 1 comment)
23. Pipe Viewer – A Unix Utility You Should Know About (165 points | 28 comments)
24. Bit-twiddling optimizations in Zed's Rope (113 points | 39 comments)
25. Does the Internet Route Around Damage? – Baltic Sea Cable Cuts (66 points | 16 comments)
26. Show HN: Convolution Solver and Visualizer (5 points | discuss)
27. SQL, Homomorphisms and Constraint Satisfaction Problems (127 points | 13 comments)
28. Fashion History Timeline (21 points | 1 comment)
29. Gregglogger (20 points | 5 comments)
30. /usr/bin/env -S uv run (41 points | 7 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
